decks.notes: The main focus of this deck is to use aggressive tactics and quick creatures to control the board and deal damage to the opponent as quickly as possible. The deck utilizes a mix of powerful creature cards and removal spells to maintain board dominance and pressure the opponent. With a combination of evasion abilities, disruption effects, and efficient creature removal, the Dimir Aggro deck aims to apply constant pressure and overwhelm the opponent before they can react effectively. This deck prioritizes speed and aggression to secure a swift victory in a 1 vs 1 format.

This deck focuses on utilizing powerful control elements and ramping up mana to play big threats like Archangel of Wrath and Atraxa, Grand Unifier. By using cards like Herd Migration and Up the Beanstalk, the deck aims to quickly generate mana and overwhelm the opponent with big creatures. With Leyline Binding and Spelunking to control the board, as well as Cavern of Souls to protect key creatures, this deck aims to out-value and out-maneuver the opponent in a long game. Utilizing a mix of creature threats and control elements, this deck aims to dominate the mid-to-late game.

This deck focuses on utilizing a variety of control spells and removal cards to disrupt and dismantle the opponent's strategy, while also maintaining card advantage through spells like Memory Deluge and Deadly Cover-Up. It aims to outlast the opponent by controlling the board and denying them resources, all while utilizing powerful cards like Jace, the Perfected Mind to further cement its advantage. The deck also includes a few key creatures and lands to provide additional utility and threats, creating a well-rounded and adaptable control deck.

This deck focuses on quickly overwhelming the opponent with aggressive creatures and powerful control spells in order to maintain board presence and disrupt the opponent's strategy. The key strategy involves utilizing cards like Sheoldred, the Apocalypse and Faerie Mastermind to control the board, along with efficient removal spells like Go for the Throat to maintain tempo. By carefully managing resources and applying pressure on the opponent, the deck aims to outpace the opponent and secure victory through a combination of aggression and disruption.

This Golgari Aggro deck focuses on using low cost creatures and removal spells to quickly attack and overwhelm the opponent. The key strategy is to efficiently control the board with cards like Go for the Throat and Cut Down while utilizing the synergy between creatures like Mosswood Dreadknight and Deep-Cavern Bat. Restless Cottage and Underground Mortuary provide additional resources and card advantage, allowing the player to maintain pressure on the opponent. The deck aims to establish a strong board presence and close out the game quickly through relentless aggression and strategic plays.

This Temur Control deck focuses on generating card advantage through card draw and using powerful spells to control the board. The deck utilizes cards like Aftermath Analyst and Memory Deluge to generate card advantage, while also using removal spells like Worldsoul's Rage and Ill-Timed Explosion to control the field. The deck also includes powerful late-game threats like Shigeki, Jukai Visionary and Nissa, Resurgent Animist to close out the game. The mana base is designed to support the deck's triple-color requirements, with a mix of lands to ensure consistency in casting spells.
